mapper.select:
SELECT M.MCHN_CODE, M.MCHN_NAME, NVL(M.MCHN_MODEL, ' ') AS MCHN_MODEL, VC.VEND_CD_CODE, VC.VEND_CD_NM, M.MCHN_PRICE, M.MCHN_PRCHS_DATE, M.MCHN_MNFCT_DATE, M.MCHN_INSERT_DATE, M.MCHN_INSPC_CYCLE, M.MCHN_STTS, NVL(M.MCHN_REMK, ' ') AS MCHN_REMK FROM BF_EQP_MCHN M JOIN BF_CMN_VENDOR_CODE VC ON M.VEND_CD_CODE = VC.VEND_CD_CODE WHERE 1=1
AND MCHN_NAME LIKE '%'||#{mchnName}||'%'
ORDER BY MCHN_CODE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BF_EQP_MCHN VALUES('MCHN'||LPAD(BF_EQP_MCHN_CODE_SEQ.nextval, 3, 0), #{mchnName}, #{vendCdCode}, #{mchnModel}, NULL, #{mchnPrice}, #{mchnPrchsDate}, #{mchnMnfctDate}, #{mchnStts}, #{mchnInsertDate}, (select to_date(INSPC_EDATE + #{mchnInspcCycle},'yy/MM/dd') from BF_EQP_INSPC where mchn_code = #{mchnCode}), #{mchnInspcCycle}, #{mchnRemk})
mapper.select:
SELECT MC.MCHN_CODE, MC.MCHN_NAME, NVL(MC.MCHN_MODEL, ' ') AS MCHN_MODEL, MC.MCHN_MNFCT_DATE, MC.MCHN_INSPC_CYCLE, NVL(MC.MCHN_STTS, ' ') AS MCHN_STTS, NVL(MC.MCHN_REMK, ' ') AS MCHN_REMK, VCD.VEND_CD_NM, INP.INSPC_EDATE FROM BF_EQP_MCHN MC JOIN BF_CMN_VENDOR_CODE VCD ON MC.VEND_CD_CODE = VCD.VEND_CD_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN BF_EQP_INSPC INP ON INP.MCHN_CODE = MC.MCHN_CODE
WHERE MC.MCHN_NAME LIKE '%'||#{mchnName}||'%'
ORDER BY MCHN_CODE
